about_the_game: Canada's First Prime Minister, John A. Macdonald, takes his place on the global stage. With a unique set of traits designed to take advantage of the 1.1 update to the crafting panel, John A. Macdonald is being provided for free to all Ara players, thank you for playing!
detailed_description: Canada's First Prime Minister, John A. Macdonald, takes his place on the global stage. With a unique set of traits designed to take advantage of the 1.1 update to the crafting panel, John A. Macdonald is being provided for free to all Ara players, thank you for playing!
name: Ara: History Untold, John A. Macdonald

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

esrb.descriptors:
Mild Violence
Alcohol Reference
Use of Tobacco

short_description: Canada's First Prime Minister, John A. Macdonald, takes his place on the global stage. With a unique set of traits designed to take advantage of the 1.1 update to the crafting panel, John A. Macdonald is being provided for free to all Ara players, thank you for playing!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish, Vietnamese, Malay
*languages with full audio support
